channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: From Mona Lisa to golden toilet, the art heists that shook the world
History Today: When Maharaja Hari Singh of Jammu and Kashmir sent Instrument of Accession to India
Can the ‘military sleep method’ help you fall asleep in 2 mins?
How Argentina’s midterm polls are a big test for Trump ally, Milei
When Osama bin Laden escaped Afghanistan disguised as a woman
'The pressure was unbearable..': The shocking suicide of Maharashtra doctor who died by suicide after rape by cop
Here’s why there is no correlation between India’s move to cut Russian oil imports and impending US trade deal
item.description: PM Modi is taking a long view of the relationship, which is reflected in India’s calmness and restraint despite relentless provocation from the other side

item.title: How Francesca Orsini’s deportation is no loss to India or Hindi
item.description: The idea that Indians require a European to ‘teach’ them Hindi echoes colonial-era paternalism, ignorant of the vibrant domestic literary scene

item.title: India needs a whole-of-nation approach to reduce import dependency on China
item.description: A multi-sector analysis of India’s import dependency highlights reliance on China in several critical sectors, including manufacturing, lithium, APIs, and electronics. While India has notable success stories, it requires a focused strategy on import substitution to achieve self-reliant growth

item.title: The mouse, the cat and the hunter: Mahabharata’s geostrategic lessons for today’s Bharat
item.description: Bhishma’s counsel to Yudhishthira remains timeless: There are no permanent friends, no permanent enemies; only eternal interests endure

item.title: West still clings to intellectual colonialism while Indians face scholastic apartheid
item.description: It is impossible to ignore that Western scholars—overwhelmingly White—have exercised an unrestrained entitlement to interpret, categorise, and often diminish Indian culture, religion, and society with little pushback from Indian institutions themselves

item.title: Pakistan issues airspace curbs as India prepares for Trishul tri-services drill near Sir Creek
item.description: Pakistan has restricted several air traffic routes over its central and southern regions just days before India’s tri-services exercise, Trishul, begins near the border. The Notam, issued for October 28–29, comes as India prepares a large-scale Army, Navy, and Air Force drill near Sir Creek from October 30 to November 10.
